scripts.init: git init && git add . && git commit -am "Generated {{input `name`}} from {{.generator}}"
scripts.test: docker-compose -p {{input `name`}}-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml run agent npm test && docker-compose -p {{input `name`}}-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.test:windows: docker-compose -p {{input `name`}}-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml run agent npm test & docker-compose -p {{input `name`}}-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml down
